title: Synchronous Remote Accounting Education: Development of Gesture-Based Practical Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic accounting principles and financial statement analysis experience
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service and in-service teachers to transfer accounting practice skills, emphasizing real-time interaction via personal digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate accounting practice procedures with hand gestures using a document camera/tablet in a synchronous online environment with 90% accuracy.
Learners can analyze visual cues that induce a sense of social connectedness and apply them in online lesson design.
Learners can develop at least three practical education scenarios based on the mirror neuron activation theory.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
